alert.note: Alert for Pondera; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 07 at 3:27PM MST until March 07 at 4:30PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Pondera County in north central Montana... Southern Toole County in north central Montana... * Until 430 PM MST. * At 326 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 16 miles northeast of Conrad to 9 miles east of Columbia Falls, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Variable visibility down to a quarter mile or less and slippery roads could result in hazardous driving conditions. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 324 and 359. Highway 89 between mile markers 70 and 89. Locations impacted include... Conrad, Valier, Brady, Dupuyer and Ledger. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Wet roadways will quickly freeze. Black ice will cause roads, bridges and overpasses to become slick and dangerous. Slow down and be prepared for sudden loss of traction.
